name: Summarify â€“ AI-Powered Summarization Tool
description: Developed a Flask web app that uses Hugging Face Transformers to generate concise summaries from large texts. Focused on clean UI, NLP integration, and customizable output formats.

name: Hydro Squad
description: Designed and built a modern site for a kitchen exhaust cleaning company using Next.js, TypeScropt, and Bootstrap, Features include Google Maps integration and a streamlined quote request system.

name: Smart TreadMill
description: Engineered a touchscreen interface using Next.js for a traditional treadmill system. Includes virtual routes, custom workout presets, and real-time responsiveness to improve user interaction.

name: Halifax Transit Real-Time Transit Data Fetcher
description: Created a JavaScript-based application using GTFS open data to detch and visualize real-time transit schedules and locations, showcasing effective API use and client-side data mapping.

name: World Dictionary
description: Built an interactive web tool with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to explore country-level statistics and links to Wikipedia. Offers real-time toggling of data types like population and geography.

name: Knowledge Nexus
description: Developed a fully functional ASP.NET C# web app with responsive design, user-friendly navigation, and a secure checkout. Includes quantity selection, category browsing, and device optimization.

name: IMDB Explorer
description: Co-developed a desktop application using WPF and Entity Framework to search, filter, and display IMDB data. Implemented dynamic views, LINQ queries, and custom styling for a smooth user experience.
